resources.string:
Hi my name is Mathias 

I love football. 

My idol is Cristiano Ronaldo he is also called CR7 by his fans. What I prefer in this sport is that you have to take information every time of where are others players, even from the other team. 
The team that I support is Juventus that is the club that makes me feel a lot of emotions when I see them play. 

The fun fact is that I never played a single game of football, I never went to an academy to learn how to play. Maybe that is weird for those who practice and watch this sport. 
Sometimes, I play with my friends for fun but I am obviously not good at all, that is a facts that I cannot denied. 

Personally, I watch loads and loads of football matches, I mean probably more than 20 per week. 
It makes me understand better this sport and also the feeling of being a fan with all that entails.
